As the credits rolled in a movie theater a few nights ago, my wife, Kathy, said something like, “That was awesome. I want to see it again.”
I don’t believe we’ve seen the same movie more than once i… [+5266 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Lynch
articles.title: Moments from the Essence Festival in New Orleans - New York Post
articles.description: The 25th annual Essence festival has kicked off, as the event celebrates the empowerment among African American men and women.
articles.content:
KeKe Palmer appears during the 2022 Essence Festival, as she speaks at the Ernest N. Morial Convention Center on July 1, 2022 in New Orleans.
Getty Images for Essence
